Function.DocText: Base_Mysql_Install_PATH : Use this var to set where Mysql is installed BASE_Mysql_USER : Use this var to set which user to run any commande on Mysql BASE_Mysql_DATA_DIR : Use this var to set Where Mysql store all DDB DATAS
